label: Pipefy
description: Actions for interacting with Salesforce Objects and the Salesforce API
Authenticate.label: Authenticate
Authenticate.description: Authenticates via the Salesforce API to generate an Access Token
Authenticate.session.label: Session Name
Authenticate.loginURL.label: Base URL for your Salesforce Env
Authenticate.clientID.label: Client ID
Authenticate.clientSecret.label: Client Secret
Authenticate.username.label: Salesforce Username
Authenticate.username.description: User must have access to authenticate via API
Authenticate.password.label: Salesforce Password
Execute_SOQL.label: Execute SOQL
Execute_SOQL.description: Execute a SOQL Query and get a response as JSON
Execute_SOQL.loginURL.label: Base URL for your Salesforce Env
Execute_SOQL.session.label: Session Name
Execute_SOQL.access_token.label: Access Token
Execute_SOQL.access_token.description: Value as returned from the Authenticate action
Execute_SOQL.SOQL_Query.label: SOQL Query to execute
UpdateObject.label: Update Object
UpdateObject.description: Update Object by ObjectID and Type
UpdateObject.return_label: Update Object Response ('Object Updated Successfully' on success)
UpdateObject.loginURL.label: Base URL for your Salesforce Env
UpdateObject.session.label: Session Name
UpdateObject.access_token.label: Access Token
UpdateObject.access_token.description: Value as returned from the Authenticate action
UpdateObject.objectType.label: Object Type for Updating
UpdateObject.fieldToUpdate.label: Value(s) To update (as key value pairs)
UpdateObject.objectID.label: ObjectID of object to update
UpdateObject.updatedValue.label: Value(s) to Update (as key value pairs)
UpdateObject.fieldToUpdate.description: Dictionary of fields to be updated where key is the Object Attribute name (OwnerId for example) and value is the intended update value.
UpdateObject.updatedValue.description: Enter the value you want used for the update
InsertObject.label: Insert Object
InsertObject.return_description: New Object ID is returned on success, error message on failure
InsertObject.insertJSON.label: Value(s) to Insert (as key value pairs)
InsertObject.insertJSON.description: Dictionary of fields to be updated where key is the Object Attribute name (OwnerId for example) and value is the intended update value.
deleteObject.label: Delete Object
deleteObject.return_description: Successfully deleted message on success, error body on failure
delete.objectID.label: Object ID for object targetted for deletion
delete.objectType.label: Object Type for Deletion
GetACardByID.session.label: Session Name
GetACardByID.pipefyToken.label: Pipefy Token
GetACardByID.cardID.label: Card ID
GetACardByID.cardID.description: ID of the card being searched
GetACardByID.label: Get a Card By ID
GetACardByID.description: Gets the information of the card by the ID inserted
GetACardByID.return_description: Returns the content of the card in JSON format. Use the JSON package to query your JSON structure.
CreateCard.session.label: Session Name
CreateCard.pipefyToken.label: Pipefy Token
CreateCard.cardFields.label: Dictionary with the fields and values to create a card in Pipefy
CreateCard.pipeID.label: Pipe ID
CreateCard.pipeID.description: Pipe ID of the Pipe to create a card in
